players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I am the mafioso and I killed Bob last night. Stay cautious, as there might be another mafia member among us."
Charlie: "I think we should lynch Diana. She is the mafioso and she confessed to killing Bob last night."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
